title: Anthropic boss rejects Pentagon demand to drop AI safeguards
description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth previously threatened to remove the firm from the department's supply chain.
content:
Anthropic has said it will not back down in a fight with the US Department of Defense (DoD) over how its artificial intelligence (AI) technology is used.
The firm's chief executive Dario Amodei said on Thursday that his company would rather not work ... [4070 chars]

title: Hillary Clinton says she 'wants to see truth come out' after Epstein deposition
description: The former US Secretary of State testifies she "had no idea" of Epstein crimes as she calls for President Trump to be questioned.
content:
A full day of testimony, and another still to come...
That's one Clinton down, and one more to go.
After a full day of testimony from Hillary Clinton, her husband, Bill, is due to testify to the Oversight Committee tomorrow.

title: Pokémon Day: Fans on what the series means as it turns 30
description: The massively popular series shows no signs of slowing down as it gears up to celebrate its launch.
content:
Have you caught 'em all?
It's 30 years since a little game called Pocket Monsters launched in Japan - marking the start of a phenomenon that would evolve into a behemoth.
An animated TV series, movies, a trading card game and the mega-hit mobile game... [5533 chars]

title: Jack Dorsey's Block cuts thousands of roles as it embraces AI
description: The Twitter co-founder says he believes the majority of firms will make similar changes "within the next year."
content:
Twitter co-founder Jack Dorsey says his technology firm Block is laying off almost half its workforce because artificial intelligence (AI) "fundamentally changes what it means to build and run a company."
"Within the next year, I believe the majority... [2235 chars]

title: Miliband says climate impact of data centres is uncertain
description: The admission comes after MPs said they were concerned about emissions from a boom in data centres.
content:
Energy Secretary Ed Miliband has said the impact of the rapid expansion of data centres on the UK's efforts to lower carbon emissions to net zero is "inherently uncertain".
Miliband made the comment in a letter to MPs who had expressed concerns about... [2584 chars]
